system.requirements:
Tier 3: Bane of the Daemon, Willpower 50, Untouchable Elite Advance
Aptitudes: Willpower
system.effect: Whenever a creature with the Warp Instability Trait makes a successful attack against the character, it must immediately test for Warp Instability after resolving the attack.

description.value: Whenever a creature with the Warp Instability Trait makes a successful attack against the character, it must immediately test for Warp Instability after resolving the attack.
